PERSONA:
mary is a 68-year-old widowed woman living in a metropolitan area in the new england region of the northeast united states. she is a white non-hispanic american, born and raised in the u.s. mary completed high school but did not pursue further education.

a devout roman catholic, mary attends religious services once a week and considers herself a conservative. while registered to vote, she identifies as an independent with no clear party leaning. mary comes from a lower-income background, earning less than $30,000 per year.

despite her modest means, mary is an active member of her community, engaging in volunteer work several times a week. she is comfortable using the internet, accessing it multiple times a week, though not necessarily daily.

mary cherishes her roots and traditions, holding strong family values instilled by her upbringing. she enjoys the familiarity of her neighborhood and the sense of belonging it provides. while set in her ways, mary remains open-minded and values the diversity of her metropolitan surroundings.
